page.title: 16BOSTON W.DAY AT WEMBLEY
page.content: {Saturday,May 11th.}was the day of the {F.A.Challenge Trophy.Boston United v. {Wealdstone.All the coaches for 20miles around Boston were booked and a train booked for the day.All the tickets were sold,at least{10 000. Most coaches stopped at{Baldock}and we saw} lots of people we knew.We arrived at {Wembley at 1430hrs}on a bright afternoon.The stadium looked great from a distance but disappointing when we got close.It was an exciting match and Boston lost 2-1.We stopped at the Comet,Hatfield and had a meal.It was a great day out. When we got home,about,2200hrs,we had a drink.Then we were told about the fire at{Bradford}and all the people who were killed.It was a shock,so sad and frightening.
